Class LyricsRepository

java.lang.Object
musicApp.repositories.LyricsRepository
public class LyricsRepository extends Object
Repository for managing lyrics file paths. This class handles the storage and retrieval of lyrics file paths for songs. It uses a JSON file to store the paths and provides methods to read and write these paths, but also ensure the integrity of the data.

      public Path getLyricsDir()

    • getLyricsPaths

      public Optional<LyricsRepository.LyricsFilePaths> getLyricsPaths(String songPath)
      Gets the paths to lyrics files for a song.
      Parameters:
      songPath - The path to the song file
      Returns:
      LyricsFilePaths containing text and karaoke paths, or null if not found

    • updateLyricsPaths

      private void updateLyricsPaths(String songPath, String textPath, String karaokePath) throws IllegalArgumentException, IOException
      Updates the lyrics file paths for a song.
      Parameters:
      songPath - Path to the song file
      textPath - Path to the text lyrics file (relative to lyrics directory)
      karaokePath - Path to the karaoke lyrics file (relative to lyrics directory)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
      IOException
